name: MargotDavidStudios
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Margot, David and Dad are learning how to make Alexa skills and flash briefings. We hope to share our experiences and thoughts through this medium. We like having outdoor adventures, playing video games, cooking, reading and just hanging out!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
